price: "Wanda aka jũyar da shi daga gare shi, a wannan Rãnar, to, lalle ne, (Allah) Yã yi masa rahama, Kuma wannan ne tsĩra bayyananniya."
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
